response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $15,000 to you. I understand that such an investment is significant, and I want to ensure it's accessible to you. Therefore, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $12,000. This offer includes a comprehensive warranty and personalized support to make sure you get the most out of your investment. I believe this price reflects the value you will gain from the product while also providing you with a substantial savings. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can discuss how this product can enhance your experience.", "product_price": 12000}
